NF.Q: In the column Processing Facilities of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 11550? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
NF.A: {Beverage Plants} has an outflow of {22042}, {Bakeries} has an outflow of {11690}, {Slaughterhouses} has an outflow of {20713}.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Processing Facilities and column Distribution Channels is the flow between 3605 and 16201? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {11410} from node {Beverage Plants} to {Online Platforms}, a flow of {11690} from node {Bakeries} to {Online Platforms}, a flow of {5749} from node {Slaughterhouses} to {Wholesalers}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 9007 and 11350? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {9822} from node {Online Platforms} to {Farms}, a flow of {11291} from node {Wholesalers} to {Farms}, a flow of {10173} from node {Wholesalers} to {Ranches}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Bakeries to node Online Platforms and from node Beverage Plants to node Online Platforms, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Bakeries} to node {Online Platforms} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Wholesalers to node Greenhouses, from node Online Platforms to node Farms, and from node Beverage Plants to node Online Platforms, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Beverage Plants} to node {Online Platforms} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Slaughterhouses to node Wholesalers, from node Online Platforms to node Orchards, and from node Slaughterhouses to node Online Platforms, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Slaughterhouses} to node {Online Platforms} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Distribution Channels of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Distribution Channels is {Online Platforms}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Slaughterhouses to target node Greenhouses? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Slaughterhouses to node Greenhouses is: {Slaughterhouses, Online Platforms, Greenhouses}.
